definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
rule (e.g. of science)/law of behavior/regular pattern/rhythm/discipline
to break the rules/an illegality/a foul
code of conduct/conventions/common practice/routine (medical procedure etc)

sentences.english: Secondly, this paper fully introduces incentive regulation.
sentences.chinese: 其次，本文對激勵性規制作了系統介紹。

sentences.english: In excess skewness the correction may be turning.
sentences.chinese: 偏斜度超過規定時，可採用車削校正。

sentences.english: This violinist is as good as Juilliard-trained violinists go.
sentences.chinese: 這個小提琴家和朱麗亞訓練的小提琴家規爲一類。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a multi-purpose marking device which belongs to the industrial marking tool.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型爲多種用途的劃線規，屬工業劃線工具。

sentences.english: I have read the Libraries Regulation, and I agree to abide by it.
sentences.chinese: 本人已閱讀圖書館規例，並同意遵守。

sentences.english: Top-of-the-line reels usually have a line guide made of titanium.
sentences.chinese: 頂級的輪子通常有鈦金屬的導線規。

sentences.english: The collected blood plasma is freeze maintained after conventional detection.
sentences.chinese: 採得的免疫血漿經常規檢測後凍存。

sentences.english: the organization that issues the all-important kashrut stamp for food.
sentences.chinese: 的給食品頒發首要猶太教規標誌的機構主管。

sentences.english: Smart Start Keep a screw pitch gauge in your tool box.
sentences.chinese: 聰明的開頭在你的工具箱裏放一個螺距規。

sentences.english: If you don't, she thinks you do not like her.
sentences.chinese: 如果你一直規規矩距的，她又覺得你不喜歡她。

sentences.english: Be free of any administrative fee for industrial project.
sentences.chinese: 工業項目，各種行政性規費全免。
